name: agentflow
description: AgentFlow â€” Autonomous AI agents. Instant payments. Zero gas. Arc Testnet + Circle x402.

scripts.build: echo "Skipping compile step (runtime uses tsx server.ts)"
scripts.dev:stack: concurrently -n f,r,a,w -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "npm run dev:facilitator" "npm run dev:research" "npm run dev:analyst" "npm run dev:writer"
scripts.gen:seller-address: node -e "const { privateKeyToAccount } = require('viem/accounts'); const pk = '0x' + require('crypto').randomBytes(32).toString('hex'); const a = privateKeyToAccount(pk); console.log('Add to .env:\nSELLER_ADDRESS=' + a.address);"
